panels.description: Current epoch num
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: This counter is set to the round of the highest committed block.
panels.title: Last committed round

panels.description: Total number of errors in main loop
panels.title: Error count

panels.description: The counter corresponds to the version of the last committed ledger info
panels.title: Last committed version

panels.description: Count of the transactions since last restart. state is success or failed
panels.title: Committed Transactions

panels.description: Execution time per user transaction (in seconds)
panels.title: Transaction exec time

panels.description: Count of the committed blocks since last restart
panels.title: Committed blocks

panels.description: Number of transactions processed by the validator, with either "success" or "failure" labels
panels.title: Transactions validated

panels.description: Histogram for the number of txns per (committed) blocks.
panels.title: Transactions per committed block

panels.description: Histogram for different stages of a block
panels.title: Block tracing

panels.description: This counter is set to the last round reported by the local round_state
panels.title: Last local round

panels.description: The timeout of the current round.
panels.title: Round timeout ms

panels.description: Count of the timeout rounds since last restart (close to 0 in happy path) including the number of timeouts a node experienced since last restart
panels.title: Timeout rounds

panels.description: Count of the rounds that gathered QC since last restart
panels.title: QC Rounds

panels.description: Total number of this validator's committed proposals in the current reputation window
panels.title: Committed proposal in window

panels.description: Total number of this validator's committed votes in the current reputation window
panels.title: Committed votes in window

panels.description: Count of the block proposals sent by this validator since last restart (both primary and secondary)
panels.title: Block proposals sent

panels.description: Count the number of times a validator voted for a nil block since last restart
panels.title: Vote nil count

panels.description: Count of the pending outbound round timeouts
panels.title: Pending round timeouts

panels.description: Count of the pending messages sent to itself in the channel
panels.title: Pending self messages

panels.description: Counters (queued, dequeued, dropped) related to pending network notifications to Consensus
panels.title: Pending consensus network events

panels.description: Counters (queued, dequeued, dropped) related to consensus channel
panels.title: Consensus channel messages

panels.description: Counters (queued, dequeued, dropped) related to block retrieval channel
panels.title: Block retrieval channel messages

panels.description: Counts the number of times the sync info message has been set since last restart
panels.title: Sync info msgs sent

panels.description: Counter for the number of blocks in the block tree (including the root)
panels.title: Blocks in tree
